properties.description: Workers Comp FROI API provides the capability to create, update and retrieve a FROI for Workers Comp line of business.

sourceSystemUserId.description: To identify the user who initiated the transaction in the source system.

sourceSystemCode.description: Alphanumeric code identifying the source system from where the transaction is originated. This must be a supported code. List of supported Source System Code along with description can be retrieved by passing domainType equal to SourceSystem to List of Values API.

sourceSystemRequestNo.description: Request sequence generated in the source system to uniquely identify a request.

sourceSystemUserName.description: Name of the user who initiated the inquiry in the source system.

claimID.description: Unique claim Identifier autogenerated by the system.

fnolNo.description: Unique First Report of Injury No autogenerated by the system.

claimNo.description: Unique claim# autogenerated by the system.

froiTypeIndicator.description: If loss is to be recorded in the system, but no payment needs to be processed for the claim.

reportedDate.description: Date on which the claim is reported.

namedInsuredEntityCode.description: System generated entity code to map NamedInsured.

namedInsuredRequestSequence.description: Temporary sequence generated by the target application/system to link namedInsured entity.

unverifiedPolicyInd.description: Provision to enter claim on an unverified policy.

reportedByInsRel.description: Which entity has reported the claim.e.g EMPLOYER/BROKER

reportingMethod.description: Mode of communication used to report the claim.

reportingType.description: How was the claim reported? e.g via CallCenter, or via Customer Portal

company.description: Company code of the underwriter policy system.

program.description: Program details applicable to the claim.

employerLocationInd.description: Identifier to determine whether the loss location is same as employer or different

inLitigation.description: Identifier to determine the status of Claim/FROI being in litigation or not.

sourceSystemUserId.description: To identify the user who initiated the transaction in the source system.

sourceSystemCode.description: Alphanumeric code identifying the source system from where the transaction is originated. This must be a supported code. List of supported Source System Code along with description can be retrieved by passing domainType equal to  �SourceSystem� to List of Values API.

sourceSystemRequestNo.description: Request sequence generated in the source system to uniquely identify a request.

sourceSystemUserName.description: Name of the user who initiated the inquiry in the source system.

policyNo.description: policy no for which the claim is to be generated.

status.description: Policy status. e.g Inforce,Undernotice, cancelled etc.

lOB.description: Policy Line of Business.e.g PA,CA etc.

productCode.description: Product code of the Policy. e.g. Commercial package Policy, homweowners

sourceCoveragePartID.description: Policy coverage part id appliable based on policy LOB.

policyId.description: Unique Policy id generated by the claim system.

program.description: Program type based on the Policy.

sourceSystemUserId.description: To identify the user who initiated the transaction in the source system.

sourceSystemCode.description: Alphanumeric code identifying the source system from where the transaction is originated. This must be a supported code. List of supported Source System Code along with description can be retrieved by passing domainType equal to  �SourceSystem� to List of Values API.

sourceSystemRequestNo.description: Request sequence generated in the source system to uniquely identify a request.

sourceSystemUserName.description: Name of the user who initiated the inquiry in the source system.

addressType.description: Indicates whether the address is a home address or a business address.

billingAddressYN.description: Indicates whether the address is a billing address.

country.description: Country of the loss location /property / entity.

county.description: County Description of the loss location /property / entity. If both County Code and County are passed in a request, system would ignore County and will use County Code. If only County along with State is passed in a request,  system would evaluate County Code accordingly.

countyCode.description: County Code of the loss location /property. If both County Code and County are passed in a request, system would ignore County and will use County Code.

mailToAddressYN.description: Indicates whether the address is a mailing address.

otherAddressCategory.description: for address category as other , description for address category should be captured here.

primaryAddressYN.description: Indicates whether the address is a primary address.

state.description: State Code of the loss location /property / entity. e.g NY , NJ

zipCode.description: Zip Code of the loss location /property / entity.

sourceAddressLevel.description: Address Level for Policy Entities / Property. e.g Insured,Broker,AddInterest

sourceAddressID.description: Unqiue address id of the Policy system.

sourceAddressLevelID.description: Unqiue address Level id of the Policy system.e.g BUILDING or LOCATION id

sourceAddressLevelType.description: Policy Level Type of the address. e.g BUILDING,LOCATION

latitude.description: geographic latitude coordinate of the address.

longitude.description: geographic longitude coordinate of the address.

city.description: City of the loss location /property / entity.

fullAddress.example: 412 Mt. Kemble Ave, Ste 110c, Morristown, NJ 07960

addressLevel.description: System genereated address level to map address to entities/vehicles/Property.

addressLevelID.description: System generated unique identifier for address level.

claimID.description: Unique claim Identifier autogenerated by the system.

fullPayOnInjurydayInd.description: Identifier to determine full pay on injury day

salaryContinueInd.description: Identifier to determine if the salary continued

employeeRequestSequence.description: Temporary sequence generated by the target application/system to link employee entity.

claimID.description: Unique claim Identifier autogenerated by the system.

dateLastWorked.description: Date when the employee worked last

causeOfInjuryCategory.description: Category of the Cause Of Injury

workProcess.description: Work Process the Employee was engaged in when the Injury occurred
workProcess.example: Work Process the Employee was engaged in when the Injury occurred

equipmentsUsed.description: Equipment, material or Chemicals the Employee was using when the Injury occurred
equipmentsUsed.example: Equipment, material or Chemicals the Employee was using when the Injury occurred

employeeReturnedInd.description: Identifier to determine if the employee returned

dateEmployeeReturned.description: Date when the employee returned to work

injuryFatalInd.description: Identifier to determine if the injury is fatal

injuryLocRequestSequence.description: Temporary sequence generated by the target application/system to link employee/employer location with injury.

injury.description: Injury type on the body part

injuryTypeId.description: Unique injury type Identifier autogenerated by the system.

sourceSystemUserId.description: To identify the user who initiated the transaction in the source system.

sourceSystemCode.description: Alphanumeric code identifying the source system from where the transaction is originated. This must be a supported code. List of supported Source System Code along with description can be retrieved by passing domainType equal to  �SourceSystem� to List of Values API.

sourceSystemRequestNo.description: Request sequence generated in the source system to uniquely identify a request.

sourceSystemUserName.description: Name of the user who initiated the inquiry in the source system.

entityId.description: Unique entity Identifier for each claim.

DBA.description: Business alias name of the organization.

emailId1.description: Primary email address of the entity.

emailId2.description: Additional email address of the entity.

DOB.description: Date of birth of the entity.

SSN.description: Social Security Number of the entity.

taxId.description: Tax ID of the entity / vendor.

contactPerson.description: Contact Person of an Organization entity.

contactPhoneNo.description: Contact phone number of the entity.

contactPhone2.description: Aternative phone number of the contact person

contactExtnNo.description: Contact extn number of the entity.

contactPersonEmail.description: Email Address of the contact person

contactPersonFax.description: Fax No of the Contact Person.

reporterName.description: Name of the Claim reporter of an Organization entity.

reporterEmail.description: Email address of the oganization reporter.

primaryPhoneType.description: Primary phone Type of the entity.

businessPhoneNo.description: The business phone number of the organization.

homePhoneNo.description: Home phone number of the entity.

cellPhoneNo.description: Cell Phone No of the entity.

entityCategory.description: Category of the entity. e.g INDIVIDUAL/ORGANIZATION

sourceEntityId.description: Reference vendor id of the entity.

referenceEntityType.description: Entity Type of the Entity from the Policy System.

referenceEntityID.description: Entity ID of the entity from the Policy System.

isExcluded.description: Flag to indicate if the entity is an excluded driver on the policy. Applicable to auto lines of business

pasSourceEntityID.description: Unique Entity Id of the Policy System.

sourceEntityLevel.description: Level at which the entity is present at the policy. e.g POLICY,LOCATION etc.

sourceEntityLevelID.description: Unique Entity Level ID of the Policy system. eg PolicyID or Buildingid

entityRequestSequence.description: Temporary sequence generated by the target application/system to link entities to property or vehicles.

personType.description: Type of Reporter, if the Reported By is selected as Other

roleDescription.description: Role description for the entity if there are multiple roles associated to the entity

policySystemEntityCode.description: Policy System Entity Code is used to store Agent/Producer Code

sourceSystemUserId.description: To identify the user who initiated the transaction in the source system.

sourceSystemCode.description: Alphanumeric code identifying the source system from where the transaction is originated. This must be a supported code. List of supported Source System Code along with description can be retrieved by passing domainType equal to  �SourceSystem� to List of Values API.

sourceSystemRequestNo.description: Request sequence generated in the source system to uniquely identify a request.

sourceSystemUserName.description: Name of the user who initiated the inquiry in the source system.

entityId.description: Unique entity Identifier for each claim.

roleType.description: Role type e.g Engineers, Architects, Or Surveyors Not Engaged By Named Insured

sourceRoleID.description: Source role ID which comes from PAS System

developer.description: Verbose, plain language description of the problem for the app developer with hints about how to fix it.

user.description: Pass this message on to the app user if needed.

moreinfo.description: HTTP Link to more information page.

properties.description: product giving access to P&C Claims api

properties.displayName: Create workers comp first report of injury.
properties.description: This operation will setup a FROI for Workers Comp LOB.

request.description: Attributes required to setup a Workers Comp FROI.
